SummaryEnglish: In a world where supernatural powers are a part of everyday life, Superheroes fight villains who threaten peace for their own purposes. Thus, we follow the daily life of the students of the prestigious Yuuei Academy which trains the superheroes of Tomorrow.
Aliases: Boku no Hero Academia the Movie 2: Heroes Rising - Epilogue Plus
Boku no Hero Academia the Movie 2: Heroes:Rising - Epilogue Plus - Yume wo Genjitsu ni
My Hero Academia the Movie 2: Heroes Rising - Epilogue Plus
